* Event 1 took place virtually, spread over 4 days from May 11th to May 28th 2021. (schedule below)
* The projects developed at the event can be see on our [GitHub page](https://github.com/CoPeCOMET)
* There were three groups: detection of flooding in coastal traffic cameras, classification of Coastal landscapes, and natural langauge processing of conservation management plans.
